values: Other Sheep I Have: The Power of God’s Grace Among Native Americans Then and NowOther Sheep I Have: The Power of God’s Grace Among Native Americans Then and Now

There is great encouragement and hope to labor among Native Americans, and all other peoples of the word, because Christ will gather his sheep no matter where they are scattered.
